item.title: 用Github从私人repo发表Hugo静态网站到公共repo
item.description: 这个网站是建在GitHub Page上的，但我不是很喜欢把Hugo的所有内容都放在公共仓库里。我设置了一个 github action，能把 hugo 站点从一个私有仓库发布到一个专门为 GitHub Pages 设置的公共仓库。 灵感来自于这篇文章 Git Action Workflow： # This is a basic workflow to help you get started with Actions name: Hugo Build & Deploy - Private to Public # Controls when the action will run. Triggers the workflow on push or pull request # events but only for the main branch on: push: branches: [ main ] # A workflow run is made up of one or more jobs that can run sequentially or in parallel jobs: # This workflow contains a single job called "build" build: # The type of runner that the job will run on runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Steps represent a sequence of tasks that will be executed as part of the job steps: # Check Out Repository: Based on https://github.
